components: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL,ELECTRONIC STABILITY CONTROL
summary: WHILE DRIVING THE CAR, IT HAPPENS TO LOOSE POWER AND IT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO WHEEL AND MOVE THE CAR . IT STOPS IN THE MIDDLE OF THE FREEWAY AND SERVICE TRACTION CONTROL COMES UP , THEN SERVICE STABILITYTRAK  AND THEN TRACTION CONTROL OFF .  IT HAS TO BE TURNED OFF AND  THEN WAIT AND RESTART  IT AGAIN , WITH A CHECK ENGINE
